title: How to Make a Peanut Butter Covered Banana

steps.headline: Open a jar of peanut butter.
Use the knife to spread peanut butter on the banana
Spread peanut butter over each banana half.
Roll the banana in the shredded coconut.
Spread or squirt the melted/ready-set chocolate over the sides of the end of each half.
steps.description: Coat the banana half about one quarter of the way from the base.

steps.headline: Let set.
steps.description: This can be sped up by placing the banana halves in the refrigerator for 10 minutes.

steps.headline: Spread peanut butter over the uncovered part of the banana.

text: Basic peanut butter banana Peel a banana.  Open a jar of peanut butter.  Get a normal knife.  Use the knife to spread peanut butter on the banana  Enjoy!  Peanut butter coconut banana Peel the banana.  Cut into two halves.  Spread peanut butter over each banana half.  Roll the banana in the shredded coconut.  Serve.  Chocolate peanut butter banana Peel the banana.  Cut into two halves.  Spread or squirt the melted/ready-set chocolate over the sides of the end of each half. Coat the banana half about one quarter of the way from the base. Let set. This can be sped up by placing the banana halves in the refrigerator for 10 minutes. Spread peanut butter over the uncovered part of the banana.  Serve.
